```{r libraries}
rm(list= ls())
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(GLMsData)
library(AICcmodavg)
library(MASS)
library(GGally)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r readingData}
data <- read.csv("../data/nminer_messy.csv")
colnames(data) <- data[1, ]
colnames(data)
data <- data[-1, ]  
data <- na.omit(data)

```

```{r cleaningData}
str(data)
summary(data)

# Converting each of the columns datatype into numeric form.=
data <- data %>% mutate(across(everything(), as.numeric))
str(data)

```
```{r plotting}
ggplot(data, aes(x = factor(Miners), y = Eucs)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill ="pink") +
  labs(x = "Noisy Miner", y = "The Amount of Eucalypts",
       title = "Eucalypt and Noisy Miner")

ggplot(data, aes(x = factor(Miners), y = Bulokes)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = "blue") +
  labs(x = "Noisy Miner", y = "Number of Buloke Trees",
       title = "Buloke and Noisy Miner")

ggplot(data, aes(x = factor(Shrubs), fill = factor(Miners))) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill") +
  labs(x = "Shrubs",y = "Sites' Percentage",
       fill = "Miner Presence",
       title = "Noisy Miner and Shrub Cover")

```


```{r runningGLM_model}
glm_model <- glm(Miners ~ Eucs + Bulokes, 
                         family = binomial(link = "logit"), 
                         data = data)
summary(glm_model)
cat("AIC:", AIC(glm_model), "\n")
## AIC: 25.16787
cat("Residual Deviance:", deviance(glm_model), "\n")
## Residual Deviance: 19.16787 
cat("Residual DF:", df.residual(glm_model), "\n")
## Residual DF: 19.16787 
cat("Dispersion (c-hat):", deviance(glm_model) / df.residual(glm_model), "\n")
## Dispersion (c-hat): 0.684566

```
